Title: Restrict Edit - Unauthenticated (Board View)
Description: Verify unauthenticated user is blocked from editing a task in Board view
Preconditions: User is not logged in. At least one task exists on the board.
Steps: Click the edit icon on any task card in the Board view.

Title: Restrict Edit - Unauthenticated (Board View)
Expected Result: User is redirected to the Login page.

Title: Restrict Edit - Unauthenticated (Task Detail)
Description: Verify unauthenticated user is blocked from editing a task from the Task Detail modal
Preconditions: User is not logged in. At least one task exists.
Steps: Open a task's details by clicking on its title.

Title: Restrict Edit - Unauthenticated (Task Detail)
Steps: Click the 'Edit' button inside the Task Detail modal.
Expected Result: 'Authentication Required' modal appears over the detail modal.

Title: Restrict Edit - Authenticated
Description: Verify authenticated user can edit tasks normally
Preconditions: User is logged in. At least one task exists.
Steps: Click the edit icon on any task card.
Expected Result: Task edit form opens directly without any auth block.

Title: Task Creation - Public Access
Description: Verify unauthenticated user can still create tasks

Title: Status Change - Public Access
Description: Verify unauthenticated user can still change task status
Preconditions: User is not logged in. At least one task exists on board.
Steps: Drag a task to a different status column or use the status dropdown.
